tasks.q-discuss: gh api graphql -F owner='commonhaus' -F name='foundation-draft' -F query=@./.github/query.discussions.graphql > activity-discussions.json
tasks.q-pins: gh api graphql -F owner='commonhaus' -F name='foundation-draft' -F query=@./.github/query.pinned.graphql > activity-pinned.json
tasks.q-pr: gh api graphql -F owner='commonhaus' -F name='foundation-draft' -F query=@./.github/query.pullrequests.graphql > activity-prs.json
tasks.activity: deno task q-pins && deno task q-discuss && deno task q-pr && deno task assemble
